smartsag.Encryption

Class Encryption

  • java.lang.Object
    • smartsag.Encryption.Encryption

  • public class Encryption
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that initiates and handles encryption. To be used in encrypting and decrypting data to and from the database.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javax.crypto.Cipher cipher 
      private javax.crypto.spec.IvParameterSpec ivSpec 
      private java.security.Key key

      Encryption(java.lang.String encryptionType, java.lang.String encryptionKey, java.lang.String salt)
      Creates an encryption object with a specific type of encryption, a key and a salt for hashing.
